reference.shortdesc: Media track settings specify the location of supplemental text-based data for the referenced media, for example, subtitles or descriptions.

section.title: Usage information

section.p: The media track settings are modeled on the track element used in HTML5 media elements. They refer to track resources that use Web Video Text Track Format (WebVTT).
